name: K9.5 5: The Howlywood Premiere
overview: The members of K9.5 are preparing for the world premiere of their newest video. Maxine is tracking down unique sound and music samples, Theo and Ella are collection 3-D effects samples and Gershwyn and Ridd are filming live-action footage. Your child helps the badn members finish their projects and then watches the long-awaited video premiere! K9.5 5: The Howlywood Premiere is an educational game aiming to help the player to understand the nuances of a language.
